1. INTRODUCTORY QUESTIONS

What year did you start homesteading in Eastern Canada? 1911
Where did you set up homesteading? East side of Allan

For how many people did you prepare meals? 3
How far was it to your nearest store? 2 miles
How often could a visit be made to the store? Twice a month

flour, sugar, syrup, macaroni, oatmeal

22. Please tell what other edible foods from your garden or nearby gardens you are able to grow and share, and why.

It was a very hot day when we started our journey back to town. We had no choice but to head out early. The heat was intense and the sun was beating down on us. We had to keep moving to avoid the harsh rays. We stopped at a small store to buy some water and snacks. The store was crowded and the prices were high. We bought what we needed and continued our journey.
